meanings.definition: A type of cell in the central nervous system that produces the myelin sheath around nerve fibers.
meanings.sent1: The oligodendroglias play a crucial role in protecting nerve fibers.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study oligodendroglias to understand how myelin sheath is formed.
meanings.sent3: When the oligodendroglias went on strike, the nerve fibers felt exposed.
meanings.sent4: The oligodendroglias are like diligent builders, wrapping nerve fibers in protective coats.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, oligodendroglias look like tiny sheath-makers.
